title: Fixed grade calculation algorithm
content: Fixed the algorithm that calculates grades to make it actually accurate. You might see some of your grades drop due to the previously inaccurate calculation.

title: Added a changelog
content: You'll now be notified of new updates.

title: Removed Invalid Breakdowns
content: Removed the See Breakdown link on classes that don't have breakdowns.

title: Updated the grade calculation algorithm
content: Success skills are now optional, and 75% (of the number of outcomes) is now rounded down instead of up.
